attributes.action: To Reward David Beckham with the greatest prestige known to man!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Beckham has served his country as captain and has performed exceptionally. The free-kick against Greece was just one of his major services to England not to mention the numerous of awards that he has won at club level including the Champions League!!! So why not reward the man with the Knighthood that he deserves!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
